text: Charles Reising (August 28, 1861 – July 26, 1915), nicknamed "Pop", was a Major League Baseball outfielder for the 1884 Indianapolis Hoosiers. He appeared in two games for the Hoosiers and was hitless in eight at-bats. ==External links== *Baseball-Reference page Category:1861 births Category:1915 deaths Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Indiana Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Indianapolis Hoosiers (AA) players Category:Springfield, Ohio (minor league baseball) players Category:Birmingham (minor league baseball) players Category:Hastings Hustlers players Category:Davenport (minor league baseball) players Category:Burlington Babies players
title: Charlie Reising
